attributes.action: Introduce charges to all supermarkets for carrier bags
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To encourage people to use 'Bags for Life' or other reusable, durable bags, all plastic carrier bags in supermarkets should only be available on request and at a charge. This would significantly reduce wastage. A percentage of the revenue from charge for bags should be put towards recycling/ environmental projects.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
